column2: Weapons control has made a complaint. *Henry is brief and calm.* They're saying some, quote, "filthy meaty thing" has jammed the gun barrels.
No. This, repeat, "filthy meaty thing" burns off right after the first shot, and it doesn't damage the system itself. It's just that people don't really like working in those conditions.
Gordon says we'll just have to bear it: you can't clean that thing off with normal means.
And how long do we have to bear it?
Until we find a solution. Will that be all?
